Locations.name: Lobby
Locations.entryDescription: The lobby is a dust room empty of furnishings. Small scuffs cover the floor. A well-used room in an old building. Poorly cared for.
Locations.description: The Lobby is quiet. The front door is closed and locked.

Locations.name: Main Hall
Locations.entryDescription: The Main Hall was once a grand space. Rugs and tapestries now covered in dust and mold. The air is still. You can almost hear the sounds of merriment that once echoed here.

Locations.name: Coat Room
Locations.entryDescription: Half empty coat racks line the walls. Red velvet wainscoting. The room is warm and quiet. Inviting. Still.
Locations.description: The coat room is warm and empty.

Locations.name: Water Closet
Locations.entryDescription: The bathroom is clean and in good order; white tile floors and and porcelain pedestal sinks. Sound echoes here.
